name: Quern

pages.text: The $(thing)quern$() is a device for grinding items into powder. The base of the quern can be crafted with 3 $(item)smooth stone$() and 3 of any other $(item)stone$() blocks.
The quern needs a $(item)handstone$() to operate.
Select the quern at the top of the block and $(item)$(k:key.use)$() to place the handstone.
Select the top of the handstone and $(item)$(k:key.use)$() to add an item to it.
Select the handle and $(item)$(k:key.use)$() to spin the handstone.
The output should place on the base of the quern. $(item)$(k:key.use)$() anywhere on the base to retrieve it.
The quern is used to make various $(item)powders$() from ores, like $(item)sulfur$().
$(item)Dye$() can be obtained from various flowers.
$(l:the_world/waterways#gemstones)Gems$() can also be ground into powder.
$(item)Flour$() is also obtainable from the quern.
$(l:mechanics/flux)Flux$() is also obtainable from the quern.
